formula: Scaled Legendre polynomials evaluated at 1/2: 2^(2n)P(n, 1/2). - _Michael Somos_, Dec 03, 2001a(n) = (-1)^n*Sum_{k=0..n} C(n,k)^2*(-3)^k. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Oct 25 2003a(n) = Sum_{k=0..floor(n/2)} C(n,k)*C(2(n-k),n)(-4)^k. - _Paul Barry_, Sep 08 2004n*a(n) +2*(1-2*n)*a(n-1) +16*(n-1)*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 14 2011G.f.: G(0), where G(k)= 1 + x*(1-x)*(4*k+1)/( 4*k+2 - x*(1-x)*(4*k+2)*(4*k+3)/(x*(1-x)*(4*k+3) + 4*(k+1)/G(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jul 06 2013a(n) ~ 2^(2*n+1)*sin(Pi/12*(4*n+5))/(3^(1/4)*sqrt(Pi*n)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 30 2013a(n) = [x^n] ((1 - x)*(1 + 3*x))^n. - _Peter Bala_, Aug 16 2015a(n) = 4^n*hypergeom([-n,1+n], [1], 1/4). - _Peter Luschny_, May 09 2016
